code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var remove=function remove(id){var url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id);var request=axios.delete(url);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,updatedObject){var url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id);var request=axios.put(url,updatedObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,remove:remove,update:update};
